SELECT count(v_comic.id) FROM v_comic
AND v_comic.`userBean.id` = #{userBean.id}
and ( v_comic.redFlg = '0' OR v_comic.redFlg is NULL
OR v_comic.redFlg = '1' )
and (v_comic.`translateFlg` = '1' OR v_comic.`translateFlg` is NULL)
AND v_comic.`publishFlg` = #{publishFlg}
AND (v_comic.title LIKE #{pattern} OR v_comic.description LIKE #{pattern})

SELECT
v_comic.id as id, v_comic.title as title, v_comic.description as description, v_comic.publishFlg as publishFlg, v_comic.publishDate as publishDate, v_comic.recommendFlg as recommendFlg, v_comic.redFlg as redFlg, v_comic.translateFlg as translateFlg, v_comic.`userBean.id` as `userBean.id`, v_comic.`userBean.nickname` as `userBean.nickname`, v_comic.`userBean.signature` as `userBean.signature`, v_comic.accessCount as accessCount, v_comic.likeCount as likeCount, v_comic.commentCount as commentCount,
FROM v_comic
v_comic.id = #{id}

SELECT
v_comic.id as id, v_comic.title as title, v_comic.description as description, v_comic.publishFlg as publishFlg, v_comic.publishDate as publishDate, v_comic.recommendFlg as recommendFlg, v_comic.redFlg as redFlg, v_comic.translateFlg as translateFlg, v_comic.`userBean.id` as `userBean.id`, v_comic.`userBean.nickname` as `userBean.nickname`, v_comic.`userBean.signature` as `userBean.signature`, v_comic.accessCount as accessCount, v_comic.likeCount as likeCount, v_comic.commentCount as commentCount, IFNULL(v_access_cnt.pt, 0) + IFNULL(v_comment_cnt.pt, 0) + IFNULL(v_like_cnt.pt, 0) AS pt
FROM v_comic LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(id) AS pt FROM tongrenlu.m_access WHERE upd_date > CURRENT_DATE - 7 AND del_flg = '0' GROUP BY article_id) v_access_cnt ON v_comic.id = v_access_cnt.article_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(id) * 10 AS pt FROM tongrenlu.m_comment WHERE upd_date > CURRENT_DATE - 7 AND del_flg = '0' GROUP BY article_id) v_comment_cnt ON v_comic.id = v_comment_cnt.article_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT like_id, COUNT(id) * 5 AS pt FROM tongrenlu.r_like WHERE upd_date > CURRENT_DATE - 7 AND del_flg = '0' AND category = 'm' GROUP BY like_id) v_like_cnt ON v_comic.id = v_like_cnt.like_id
and v_comic.publishFlg = '1' and v_comic.redFlg = '0'
ORDER BY IFNULL(v_access_cnt.pt, 0) + IFNULL(v_comment_cnt.pt, 0) + IFNULL(v_like_cnt.pt, 0) DESC LIMIT 0 , 10
